name: Probe
description: Basic worker unit. Can gather resources and warp in Protoss structures.

name: Zealot
description: Powerful melee warrior.

name: Stalker
description: Ranged support strider.

name: Sentry
description: Energy Manipulator unit. Can use the Force Field, Guardian Shield and Hallucination.

name: High Templar
description: Potent psionic master. Can use Feedback and Psionic Storm. Can transform into an Archon.

name: Dark Templar
description: Deadly warrior-assassin. Cloak renders the unit invisible to enemies without detection. Can transform into an Archon.

name: Immortal
description: Assault strider. Can use Barrier to absorb damage.

name: Colossus
description: Battle strider with a powerful area attack. Can step up or down cliffs. Can be targeted by anti-air weapons.

name: Archon
description: Powerful psionic attacker.

name: Observer
description: Flying spy. Cloak renders the unit invisible to enemies without detection.
weakAgainst: Photon Cannon, Missile Turret, Spore Crawler

name: Warp Prism
description: Flying transport. Can load and unload units. Can also deploy to create a Psionic Matrix.

name: Phoenix
description: Can use Graviton beam.

name: Void Ray
description: Surgical strike craft.

name: Carrier
description: Capital Ship. Can build and launch Interceptors to make attacks.

name: Interceptor
description: Combat drones that automatically strafe their Carrier's target. Carriers can not attack without Interceptors.

name: Mothership
description: Ultimate Protoss Vessel. Can use Vortex and Mass Recall. Cloaks nearby units and structures.

name: SCV
description: Basic worker unit. Can gather resources, build Terran structures, and repair.

name: MULE
description: Prototype harvesting unit. Gathers minerals more quickly than regular SCVs. MULEs last 64 seconds before their systems fail.

name: Marine
description: General-purpose infantry.

name: Marauder
description: Heavy assault infantry.

name: Reaper
description: Raider. Capable of jumping up and down cliffs. Heals when out of combat.

name: Ghost
description: Sniper. Can use Steady Targeting, EMP Round and be upgraded to use Cloak. Can call down Tactical Nukes built at the Ghost Academy.

name: Hellion
description: Fast scout. Has a flame attack that damages all enemy units in its line of fire.

name: Siege Tank
description: Heavy Tank. Can switch into Siege Mode to provide long-range artillery support.

name: Thor
description: Heavy Assault Mech.

name: Auto Turret
description: Automated defensive turret. Times out after 10 seconds.

name: Viking
description: Durable support flyer. Loaded with strong anti-capital air missiles. Can switch into Assault Mode to attack ground units.

name: Medivac
description: Terran air transport ship. Can also heal biological units.

name: Raven
description: Aerial support unit. Can use Auto Turret, Point Defense Drone and Seeker Missiles abilities.

name: Banshee
description: Tactical strike aircraft.

name: Battlecruiser
description: Powerful warship. Can be upgraded with the Yamato Cannon and Tactical Jump ability.

name: Point Defense Drone
description: Uses a laser to shoot down enemy missiles within range 8 (9) at the cost of 10 energy. Cannot target special attacks. Times out after 14 seconds.

name: Larva
description: Morphs into Zerg units.

name: Drone
description: Basic worker unit. Can harvest minerals and Vespene Gas. Can mutate into structures.

name: Queen
description: Defensive unit. Can spawn Creep Tumors, spawn Larva, and use the Transfusion ability. Moves much faster on creep.

name: Zergling
description: Fast melee creature. Can morph into a Baneling.

name: Baneling
description: Kamikaze unit. Does damage over a small area.

name: Roach
description: Assault unit. Regenerates health quickly when burrowed.

name: Hydralisk
description: Ranged attacker.

name: Infestor
description: Infestation specialist. Can move while burrowed. Can use Fungal Growth, Neural Parasite, and Microbial Shroud abilities.

name: Ultralisk
description: Heavy assault beast /w PBAoE damage attack.

name: Broodling
description: Fast melee creature that will last for a short duration.

name: Nydus Worm
description: Friendly ground units can use a Nydus Worm to instantly travel to any other Nydus Worm or Nydus Network owned by the player. Grows creep used to feed nearby Zerg structures.

name: Overlord
description: Provides 8 supply, which raises the maximum number of units available. Can morph into Overseer and a "Dropperlord" with Ventral Sacs.

name: Overseer
description: Advanced aerial observer. Maintains the unit cap set by the Overlord. Can use Spawn Changeling and Contaminate.

name: Mutalisk
description: Air unit that bounces its shot to strike multiple targets.

name: Corruptor
description: Anti-air flyer. Can use Caustic Spray. Can morph into Brood Lord.

name: Brood Lord
description: Flying heavy-assault unit. Shoots Broodlings at its target. A Broodling is a small creature that can attack ground units.
